thread.title: Lany Snyder

author: obits@timesonline.com
title: Lany Snyder
text:
Buy Now BNI Obits 
Lany Grace (Fisher) Snyder, 81, of Mount Vernon, IN, passed away Saturday, October 10, 2015, at her home in Mount Vernon, IN. She was born February 6, 1934, in Baden, PA, to William and Ester (Knight) Fisher. 
Lany graduated from Rochester High School. She was a member of First United Methodist Church, Friends of the Alexandrian Public Library, and the Extension Homemakers. 
She was preceded in death by her parents, and brothers, William and Tom Fisher. 
She is survived by her husband of 38 years, Don Snyder; stepson, Donald Jr. (Nancy) Snyder of Beckley, WV; stepdaughters, Linda Snyder of New Castle, PA, and Debra Snyder of Ambridge, PA, and sister, Susie Ramsey of New Brighton, PA. 
Visitation with the family will be held Saturday, October 24, 2015, from 12 noon to 1:30 p.m. at the J&J SPRATT FUNERAL HOME, 1612 Third Ave., New Brighton, www.jjsprattfh.com . Lany's stepson, Reverend Donald Snyder, Jr., will officiate a memorial service at the funeral home immediately following visitation at 1:30 p.m. 
Memorial contributions may be made to the Alzheimer's Association (national site) at www.alz.org/donate .
